items.snippet: China imposes export controls on 20 Japanese entities to curb ‘remilitarisation’  ReutersChina issues dual-use blacklist of 20 Japanese entities  The Japan TimesChina bans dual-use item exports to 20 Japan defense entities  Japan Wire by KYODO NEWSChina adds 20 Japanese entities contributing to military buildup to export control list of dual-use items  Global TimesChina restricts exports to Japanese companies to curb 'remilitarization'  Nikkei AsiaChina adds Japanese entities to export control list, turning up heat on Tokyo  South China Morning PostChina's export control on Japan justified against remilitarization  news.cgtn.comChina adds Subaru, Mitsubishi, TDK and 17 other Japanese entities to export-control watchlist  digitimesChina adds 20 Japanese entities to export control watch list to curb 're-militarization'  China Daily
